title: Authentication - User Not-Entitled for TV
custom_preconds:
Given a user has MLB app installed
and is not entitled for TV
custom_steps:
When a user taps on the Authenticate with your Pay TV Provider button
and is on the Adobe Cable Auth page
custom_expected: Then the user will use Adobe Pass for authentication

title: Authentication - User Entitled for TV
custom_preconds:
Given a user has MLB app installed
and is entitled for TV
custom_steps:
When a user taps on the Authenticate with your Pay TV Provider button
and is on the Adobe Cable Auth page
custom_expected: Then the user will use Adobe Pass for authentication

title: Authentication - Cable Auth Pass
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on the Authenticate with your Pay TV Provider button
and is on the Adobe Cable Auth page
and goes through cable auth with successful creds
custom_expected: Then the user can view the feed

title: Authentication - Cable Auth Fail
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on the Authenticate with your Pay TV Provider button
and is on the Adobe Cable Auth page
and goes through cable auth with unsuccessful creds
custom_expected:
Then the user can not view the feed
and proper messaging displayed

title: Re-authentication - Same Day
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed
custom_steps:
When a user successfully cable auth into Root feed
and closes out of the feed
and attempts to access the feed again
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the feed
and will not have to re auth

title: Re-authentication - Month
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed
custom_steps:
When a user successfully cable auth into Root feed
and closes out of the feed
and attempts to access the feed after a month
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the Adobe Pass flow again
and will need to authenticate

title: Team Page IMS Module - Out of Market
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on a team page for Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates
and the user is in not in local markets (based on GPS or IP)
and a game with an In-Market feed is live
custom_expected: Then the user will not see the Team Page IMS Module

title: Team Page IMS Module - Media Off State
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on a team page for Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates
and the user is in local markets (based on GPS or IP)
and a game with an In-Market feed is not live
custom_expected: Then the Team Page IMS Module is not displayed

title: Team Page IMS Module - Media On State
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on a team page for Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates
and the user is in local markets (based on GPS or IP)
and a game with an In-Market feed is live

custom_steps_separated.content: Then the Team Page IMS Module is displayed between Top Stories and Top Videos
Then the Section Title is Watch Live on Root Sports
Then the Module Title is <Away Team> @ <Home Team>
Then the Body is Free for eligible in-market Pay TV subscribers
Then has a Live button same as MLB.TV EPG

title: Media Authentication Playback
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed
custom_steps:
When a Root Sports user is in Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates local markets (based on GPS or IP)
and user enters flow clicking on the Root IMS Module on the team page

custom_steps_separated.content: if the user already has Root auth token
if the user does not have a token
custom_steps_separated.expected: the app should present the Adobe Pass flow
the user will receive a confirmation page
the app should receive an auth token to store locally
the user should have a link to continue to watch the selected game
the user location should be checked using GPS
the user should see a "play ball" screen with a Root Sports Logo and text

custom_steps_separated.content: If there is a location or entitlement error
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user should be shown an error screen

title: Media Player
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When a Root Sports user is in Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates local markets (based on GPS or IP)
and user enters flow clicking on the Root IMS Module on the team page
and successfully auths 
and the feed starts
custom_expected: Then the playback controls and data overlays will mirror an MLB.TV feed

title: Media Player for Non-TV-Entitled User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is not entitled for TV
custom_steps:
When a Root Sports user successfully enters an In-Market feed
and taps on the top out of town scoreboard overlay
and selects an MLB.TV feed to view
custom_expected:
Then the user will be presented with the TV paywall
and will not be able to view the content unless they log in with a TV-entitled account
